plot: The Crossroads with Martin Anthony is a weekly look at Turkey from a western perspective. Hosting many guests from all walks of life, Martin shared some of the great people that live and work at the world's 'crossroads'.
title: The Crossroads with Martin Anthony
plot_es: The Crossroads with Martin Anthony is a weekly look at Turkey from a western perspective. Hosting many guests from all walks of life, Martin shared some of the great people that live and work at the world's 'crossroads'.
